ActCustoms Tariff
PrecisRegulations Amending the GOODS IMPORTED AND EXPORTED REFUND AND DRAWBACK REGULATIONS to the extent of making the terminology used therein consistent with the new Excise Act, 2001, and by adding provisions that will prevent double refund or drawback payments.
